(:action attach ; Attach an item to a location and update state
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?item) (available ?location))
  :effect (and (attached ?item ?location) (not (inventory ?agent ?item))

(:action clean ;  Clean a part of an object and update its status
  :parameters (?cleaner - tool ?part - object ?object - object)
  :precondition (and (attached ?cleaner ?part) (in_object ?part ?object) (part_of ?part ?object))
  :effect (clean ?part)
)
